metadata.title: CVE-2020-14424 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cacti before 1.2.18 allows remote attackers to trigger XSS via template import for the midwinter theme.

notes.note: sbeattie> d12800ab479 landed in 1.2.18, 0234c1b645d in 1.2.12, which fixed XSS in other themes.

criterions.comment: cacti package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
